text: |Zone C (Marsh Wall and Millwall Inner Dock)|a. This zone has a primarily residential character. b. Building heights along Marsh Wall should step down from the Canary Wharf TBZ to support its central emphasis c. Building heights should step down further from Marsh Wall and ensure that the integrity of the Canary Wharf TBZ is retained on the skyline when seen from places and bridges along the River Thames across Greater London, particularly in views identified in Policy PS8. d. Building heights should be consistent with the protection of London View Management Framework views, particularly those from Greenwich and the setting of Tower Bridge. e. An appropriate height for the tallest new developments in this zone is 180m AOD.|
